briefdescription.para: Construct a new virtual context collection with an explicit, pre-registered map handler.

briefdescription.para: Construct a new virtual context collection with templated map.

parameterdescription.para: arguments to pass to collection construct

briefdescription.para: Construct a new virtual context collection using the default map for the given index.

detaileddescription.para: The default map is found by looking up the vrt::collection::DefaultMap<...> specialization on the Index type.

parameterdescription.para: arguments to pass to collection construct

briefdescription.para: Collectively construct a new virtual context collection with templated map.

detaileddescription.para: Construct virtual context collection with an explicit map. This construct method enables distributed SPMD construction of the virtual context collection where each index is mapped with the MapFnT.

memberdef.argsstring: (typename ColT::IndexType range, DistribConstructFn< ColT > cons_fn, TagType const &tag=no_tag)
memberdef.name: constructCollective

briefdescription.para: Collectively construct a new virtual context collection with templated map.

detaileddescription.para: Construct virtual context collection with an explicit map. This construct method enables distributed SPMD construction of the virtual context collection using the DistribConstructFn. The system will invoke that function for every index in the system based on the where each index is mapped with the MapFnT.

parameterdescription.para: construct function to create an element on each node

briefdescription.para: Collectively construct a new virtual context collection with the default map.

detaileddescription.para: Construct virtual context collection with the default map. This construct method enables distributed SPMD construction of the virtual context collection where each index is mapped with the default mapping function.

memberdef.argsstring: (typename ColT::IndexType range, DistribConstructFn< ColT > cons_fn, TagType const &tag=no_tag)
memberdef.name: constructCollective

briefdescription.para: Collectively construct a new virtual context collection with the default map.

detaileddescription.para: Construct virtual context collection with the default map. This construct method enables distributed SPMD construction of the virtual context collection using the DistribConstructFn. The system will invoke that function for every index in the system based on the where each index is mapped with the default mapping function for this index type selected.

parameterdescription.para: construct function to create an element on each node

memberdef.argsstring: (typename ColT::IndexType range, DistribConstructFn< ColT > cons_fn, HandlerType const map_han, TagType const &tag)
memberdef.name: constructCollectiveMap

briefdescription.para: Collectively construct a new virtual context collection with a pre-registered map function.

detaileddescription.para: Construct virtual context collection with a pre-registered map function handler. This construct method enables distributed SPMD construction of the virtual context collection using the DistribConstructFn. The system will invoke that function for every index in the system based on the where each index is mapped with the registered map function.

parameterdescription.para: construct function to create an element on each node

briefdescription.para: Collectively construct a virtual context collection with a staged insert token to split initial construction with element insertion. Use default map for index specified.

detaileddescription.para: Construct virtual context collection with user insertions before the collection is used. The token must be moved into finishedInsert before the collection can be used.

parameterdescription.para: tag for out of order construction

briefdescription.para: Collectively construct a virtual context collection with a staged insert token to split initial construction with element insertion. Use map specified by non-type template parameter.

detaileddescription.para: Construct virtual context collection with user insertions before the collection is used. The token must be moved into finishedInsert before the collection can be used.

parameterdescription.para: tag for out of order construction

memberdef.name: insertCollectionElement

briefdescription.para: Insert a new collection element.

detaileddescription.para: call to insert a new collection element on this node. Called either during construction/staged insertion or when an element migrates into this node. Before this is called, one must construct the element. Then, one must use the CollectionTypeAttorney to do the setup for the elementwhich sets the index and other properties on the element. Once that is done, this call will register the element with the location manager and add it to the collection holders.

parameterdescription.para: unique pointer to the new, constructed collection element
whether the collection is statically sized
the home node for this element

simplesect.para: whether it successfully inserted the element

briefdescription.para: Destroy a collection.

briefdescription.para: Perform asynchronous reduction after construction of a collection to determine it's fully constructed across all nodes.
Construct a group for the collection.

detaileddescription.para: must be called for every collection before any reductions can safely complete. If the collection spans all node, this will fire a lambda that tells the system that the default_group can be used for broadcasts and reductions. Broadcasts are always valid to run (unless the group expands after LB) because it will just hit extra nodes that may not have elements.

parameterdescription.para: whether to start group construction now

briefdescription.para: Run the collection element's constructor.

detaileddescription.para: is the non-traits version of running the constructor: does not require the detection idiom to dispatch to constructor.

The alternative traits version of running the constructor based on the detected available constructor types will be accessed through the traits class directly by invoking the constructor. The traits-based alternative is DerefCons::derefTuple

memberdef.name: insertCollectionInfo

briefdescription.para: Insert collection into UniversalIndexHolder.
A core VT component managing collections of tasks across the system.

detaileddescription.para: The collection manager enables the creation, execution, message routing, and destruction of multi-dimensional collections of virtual contexts that are mapped to hardware resources. Dense, sparse, on-demand collection types are all supported. The location of these virtual contexts is managed by the location manager as they migrate or the load balancer is invoked, which moves them around the system based on instrumentation.
